attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ask the PM to ban the sale of fireworks to the general public, unless they can prove they are responsible by going on an intense 6 month course.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/FireWork-Shows/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
